review: ** ******* *** **** *** ** *** **** ******* ********** * **** **** ****** * He took care of my mother during her recent admission with so much care and precision that she was almost at a very critical stage and along with the Dr Shankars advise the entire team at Apollo played an immense role in getting back her health to normal. Thank full and whole heartedly recommend Dr Shankar.

Since I know him from the last four years, I always prefer his consultation in time of need. He is a concerned person and is conscious about the medical sufficiency which has given me the excellent outcome every time. With prior appointments, maximum of 30 minutes wait time can be expected where walking in directly may be a bit time consuming. As of my experience, all has gone well until now. I am very happy with the doctor.

I visited to meet the doctor for breathing issue. Which scared me so much. When I saw I thought he would speak with me and help me but he not even saw me he was busy with mobile while his associates was asked me few questions. The talk between me and him was 1 min and the charges was 850rs. Hope he understand
***** **** ***** ******** no patience to listen what patients want to say ..lack of patience towards patients
He is been nice and fills confidence to patient as well relatives too. I have been visting him from 4yrs *** ***** ** ** ** **** ** He saved my father.... God bless him
